sentences.en: " Carrie, " he said, using her first name with sympathetic familiarity, " I want you to love me.
sentences.cn: “ 嘉莉, "他用亲密熟悉的口吻叫着她的小名, " 我要你爱我.

sentences.en: " Just so, " went on Mr. Withers, accepting her acknowledgment of familiarity.
sentences.cn: “ 正是这样, " 威瑟斯先生见她承认知道这家旅馆,继续说道.

sentences.en: Aileen flushed a little at his familiarity.
sentences.cn: 爱玲听了这种亲昵的话儿脸有点发红了.

sentences.en: He greeted me with the easy charm and familiarity.
sentences.cn: 他同我打招呼时,挥洒自如,谈吐不拘.

sentences.en: He had behaved with undue and oily familiarity.
sentences.cn: 他表现得过于亲热，媚态毕现。

sentences.en: He treated her with the easy familiarity of an equal.
sentences.cn: 他以平等的身分对待她,态度很随和.

sentences.en: Her familiarity with Japanese surprised me.
sentences.cn: 她对日语的熟谙使我惊奇.

sentences.en: His excessive familiarity made her uncomfortable.
sentences.cn: 他过分的亲昵使她不舒服.

sentences.en: His familiarity with the language helped him enjoy his stay.
sentences.cn: 他通晓这种语言，所以逗留期间过得很惬意。

sentences.en: I miss the familiarity of home.
sentences.cn: 我怀念家的那种亲切感。

sentences.en: She needed to control her surprise at the easy familiarity with which her host greeted the head waiter.
sentences.cn: 看见主人和领班侍者打招呼时轻薄随便的样子，她简直按捺不住惊讶。

sentences.en: Sitting there in a well - worn waterproof, she talked with striking familiarity of the courts of Europe.
sentences.cn: 她坐在那儿,穿着一件旧雨衣, 谈笑自若,显得对欧洲各国的风土人情多么熟悉.

sentences.en: The enemy would always have the advantage of familiarity with the rugged terrain.
sentences.cn: 敌人一直都占有熟悉丘陵地形的优势。

sentences.en: The familiar expression held no more familiarity than his hand which reassuringly brushed my shoulder.
sentences.cn: 他用手亲切地抚摸着我的肩头,这种友爱的表示胜过了他的语言.

sentences.en: The Russian student's familiarity with Mark Twain delighted him.
sentences.cn: 苏联学生对马克·吐温的熟悉程度使他大为惊喜.

sentences.en: Tony was unnerved by the uncanny familiarity of her face.
sentences.cn: 怪异的是，她看起来竟有些面熟，这让托尼心慌意乱。

words.tran_cn: 不拘礼节地；亲密地；精通地

trans.tran_en: a good knowledge of a particular subject or place
